name: Vamps for the Memories (itch)
description:
Vamps For The Memories

An undead lord is terrorizing the countryside and every hunter in the realm is clamoring to be the first to stake'm!

  • Play as two solo hunters who band together in their quest for glory.
  • Encounter (kind of) terrifying foes!
  • Use bantering about things you encounter to save life and limb!
  • Learn new skills by trading tales of past battles!
  • Kill rats and  tolerate puns!

VftM is a breezy rpg focusing on exploration and humor. If you like Disc World, Disenchanted, The Adventure Zone, or Rude Tales of Magic there might be something for you here!

Playtime is under 4 hours.

Written, scored and scripted by Greg

Thanks Maxian, Cirinae, Zeiss, and Basar!  Can't ask for a better crew of knuckleheads!

Thanks to Aaron,  Ayne and Dave Forman for QA/Testing
